Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: Sorry you had such a rough night. <3 Try to the fluids and electrolytes going and  seek medical attention if it's not getting improving?  I remember when I first started ended up in the psych unit, they were like "we're having a hard time believing you drink that much because you're so slender." Eventually I learned it's not that uncommon for folks dealing with alcohol abuse (as I was) be lower weight, because getting proper nutrition becomes a real struggle.
